EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0).

### Iron chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of an iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5).

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- The agent attempts to craft iron chests but fails due to a lack of iron plates. Ensure sufficient iron plates are available before attempting to craft iron chests. The agent should smelt more iron ore into iron plates before attempting to craft more iron chests.

NAMESPACE
